name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Field Engineer with 9+ years of experience in designing and implementing embedded systems and in-vehicle networking solutions. Proficient in automotive standards and frameworks including **AUTOSAR**, **DDS**, and **SOME/IP** alongside strong skills in **C/C++** and **Python**. Expertise in **cloud-native** architectures and **containers**. Demonstrated knowledge of **threading**, **UDP**, and **multicast** protocols within complex systems. Committed to enhancing technical architecture and optimizing development processes, employing methodologies aligned with **SDLC**. Excellent communication skills foster effective team collaboration and customer engagement, ensuring project success.
